评论概述: Fabric is much thinner than expected
评论详情: Fit on this was okay, but the fabric was much thinner and lighter than I expected. I wanted a warm waffle knit top, but this was too light a fabric. Cute design and color was nice, but I did return it.
I really like the design and color of this top. It is lightweight and comfortable. I am going to wear this frequently because it fits nicely and is made well.

I ADORE Zeagoo.  I have bought 5 sweaters/shirts from Zeagoo and they are all so cute and comfy.  They run true to size.  Color is as described.  The fabric quality is the reason for 4 stars.. the waffle shirts pilled which is disappointing but easy to fix with electric delinter.
Top is cute. I was hoping it would be just a little thicker (it's a little on the thin side) but it is comfortable and I like it. Size was good.
I love everything about this shirt. Cut, fit and softness!!!
The shirt is comfortable and true to size. It isn't very warm for the winter weather. Great for spring or early fall.

In the picture, this shirt looks to be a nice, cozy choice for winter. Not so. The fabric is terribly thin. So much so, the white part is practically transparent. The material is limp, lifeless, and just hangs. In addition, the texture is rather slick and slimy. The sleeves are extremely long so, unless you like them hanging to your fingers, it'd need to be altered. I thought that style went out years ago. The two stars are for the nice button detail and vivid color. Otherwise, it'd be a zero.
Love waffle knit tops. The colorblock with tee button design is great

This shirt was a little thinner than expected.  But, with that said, it's a very nice top.  Price is reasonable.  And, I would still recommend it if someone didn't care about it being a little thinner material. Size was on point.
I love this shirt/blouse. It’s cute enough to wear to church or just every day wear. Great material! I’ve already order another in a different color.
I love this blouse, very nice and comfortable. I love the quality of the material, and it fits true to size.
I love the waffle fabric
Wife loved it. It was a great Christmas present.  Already worn multiple times.  Look at getting more.
I loved the colors that’s about all I can say about this shirt. The material feels funny and it’s a smaller fit so size up
Very nice.
Very comfortable lightweight tunic.  Love the color and button detail.

I’ve purchased a number of these lately.  I love the waffle knit, and the buttons add nice detail.  I bought a size medium, which I would consider to be my usual size.  So I would say these run true to size.  For reference I’m 5’6” with a bust measurement of 39” and I weigh121 lbs.  This is a nice casual top that I would recommend.

On November 6, 2024 I ordered two Zeagoo Women's tops. On November 9, I returned both at the UPS drop Off store. I received a credit for one top on November 18,  but not until December 31 2024 di I receive a notice that Zeagoo had canceled my refunded and recharged my account. By then, I had no record of the Return label and contents. I will not trust this company again.

This is a beautiful shirt and well made, great quality! The length is just right cover my tummy, slightly loose, not see through, fits true to size. I was hesitant but so glad I purchased.

love the fabric,  it's like a thermal material but looks much nicer

Loved everything about this stylish top: colors, lightweight waffle-weave, soft, not tight, roomy, and length. First cold-water, gentle wash cycle, line dried, and it is pilled all over the shirt. I've bought same fabric tops before, and did not pill. Unfortunately, I didn't wear it until after the return window passed. I will try my shaver and hand-wash in the future.
Liked so much I bought another in different colors

5’3” 112 lbs Once I exchanged for a size small I am very happy with this. Also got in black. It’s soft and fits very well. Flattering.

This is a really nice top. Fits perfectly. Very flattering on. I have gained some weight and not a lot fits me in a way that I would call flattering.  I purchased the white and navy and I really like it! Not too thick, not too thin. UPDATE... I've now ordered the green and black top and it's just wonderful.  I like these tops just as much as I like my $130 CKs or Nygard tops. I like the feel, the quality, the fit and the look.

Very cute shirt, it appears as pictured but the fabric is very thin. I got the tan and white, and could see right through the white part. If I chose a darker color, I don't think it would have been an issue at all.

The sweater itself is really cute, and the fabric is pretty soft, but it’s a lot thinner than I expected. It’s also shorter than it looks in the picture. I like long shirts. Wow I really expected this top to not be so see through. I need this for a outdoor black and white party tomorrow  I will have to make it work

I love this tunic.  The color is just what I wanted.  The material is soft and feels good on your skin.  I think this tunic will look with really good paired with any color pants.  Whether it be jeans or dress pants.  You can dress it up or dress it down.  I am 5'4" and weigh 120 lbs and I bought a medium.  I don't think it will be a hot tunic so it can be worn spring, fall and winter.  I recommend this tunic.

Nice shirt, I get lots of compliments on the style and colors (caramel and black). However, it runs big -- or "relaxed". I'm 5' tall and 135 lbs and I find the Med shirt a bit too roomy. Also, I wish the fabric were a bit thicker/heavier, it's just a bit thin. But it's comfortable, washes and dries well.

Like this shirt quite a bit. Soft and comfortable. Not too thick to wear in the still hot early fall. Washes and dries well. Easy to style. Colour is nice. Fits well.

I didn't realize until I put this on that it reminded me of a Star Trek uniform. Not a lot, but a little. I'm totally fine with that, and not everyone is going to see that. I do like the color a lot, and the fit is nice to. This is a great fall sweater, and even for winter.
This top is so soft and so cute. I love the look and the fit.

Cute, simple, effortless fall style. This sweater is made well, quality fits price point. Easy to launder. Comfortable and fits true to size, not form fitting but, more of a loose not oversized, fit. Provides a light layer of warmth.

Its an okay long sleeve. Wife has to wear something under because its pretty thin and kind of itchy  But she said that's normal for this type of shirt. Overall she liked it and definitely more in line with early spring and fall wear.
Very nice shirt, fit well, comfortable  Would buy again
Super cute!  It fits just right and the colors are great-very stylish.

True to size. Soft material.  No smell
Very nice sweater!  I love the detail.  The black and white combo look great.
Nice fit but too see through

This is a lightweight waffle type of shirt. I bought it larger as I am apple shaped and prefer not to have tops clinging to my stomach area. It fits loosely, but not boxy. It has movement to it. I received compliments on the look and fit of this shirt. A sweater or jacket could be layered over the shirt.

This waffle knit shirt from Zeagoo is the perfect option for the fall. I wore it to work yesterday with jeans and brown boots and it gave off that awesome autumn vibe. The shirt is very comfortable and has such cute styling accents like the buttons that fall along the top white section. And the green color of this is that awesome autumn army green in tone. The one thing to be aware of is that the white is a bit see through so you will want to wear a skin tone colored bra, not a white one.
This is such a cute top! Perfect for fall weather as it’s not heavy. Runs true to size. I’m 5’1 and 148lbs and bought a medium and it fits great! Very comfortable.
I love this shirt. It looks great. Not to heavy. Not boxy.
Really like the top,  fits great and very comfortable.  I didn't care for the buttons (the color) but no problem,  I changed them to black and they look great.

评论概述: Flattering cut with standout button detail
评论详情: For reference, I am 5'6" and 160 lbs, and my measurements are 36" / 30" / 44". I typically wear medium or large tops, depending on the brand and how fitted or loose of a fit I want. I got the army in large.  This is not an extraordinary top, but it's still a win for me! I washed before wearing, and that softened it up a bit. The fit is exactly what I wanted, and I think it is quite flattering. I love a good basic with a detail that makes it stand out a bit - something a little different - and the buttons on this have that effect. The fabric is on the thinner side. This will be a good top for fall and early-winter.
Fit well

This is a casual ribbed knit shirt for fall and winter. You could layer it but it also has a nice button detail on the shoulder. It's looks good with jeans or even khaki or dress pants. It's very soft and warm and came out of the washer and dryer without any pilling. The seams are all overlocked and won't unravel. The sleeves are long enough to pull your hands inside but not too long that it looks like you're wearing a man's shirt. I'm waiting for this endless summer to end so that I can wear my new cozy shirt.

This shirt is made out of really thin and rough materials. The length of the shirt is not like the image and isn't very flattering. The buttons are a cute accent but don't line up at all. This is a very uncomfortable shirt.
Fits great. Material is good 👍
Nice casual dress top!  Long enough you could wear with leggings.  Super cute!

My wife was very pleased with this top, saying it fit well and was classy looking. She was somewhat surprised, as she didn’t know the buttons on the front were only on one side. She would have preferred they were on both sides, but that was just her preference. She said it is comfortable to wear and is pleased with it.

Comfortable shirt. I got the Medium, which is usually snug on my, but this is more relaxed. The fabric is soft and stretchy and the design is flattering for my apple shape, drawing the eye up to the white and slenderizing the rest with navy blue.  Good find.
Love the shirt, so cute and soft.  Fit to the right size.
This shirt is perfect for wearing to work or out with friends. Perfect for all weather. Great length.

This shirt is very light weight. I love the two toned fabric, and the buttons that add detail to it. It is comfy, and just warm enough for a cool fall evening. I did wash this top, and it went through the washer and dryer on normal cycles just fine with no shrinking. This top is perfect for casual or business casual attire, and would pair nicely with a pair of jeans, or a pair of slacks.
